titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majestie, the humble petition of the countie of Cornvvall
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: At foot: His Majesties answer to the petition of Cornwall, at the court at York. 26. June 1642.
